name: Dayz-scala
tagline: A zombie mod for Minecraft based off the mod for Arma 2
body:
![logo](http://i.imgur.com/NobOM0t.png "Logo")

### Welcome to DayZ Minecraft

The world has been hit by a new and presently unknown infection which has wiped out most of the world's population. You are one of the few who have survived and now you must search this new wasteland in order to fight for your life against what is left of the indigenous population, now infected with the disease. Go solo or team up with friends and take on the world as you choose your path in this brutal and chilling landscape using whatever means you stumble upon to survive.

### Installation

DayZ is installed like any other Minecraft Forge mod, by placing the mod in the client or server's mods folder. Minecraft Forge installation instructions can be found [here](http://www.minecraftforge.net/wiki/Installation/Universal).

Once installed, a new Dayz world can be started by selecting one of the DayZ world types on the client or by adding ```level-type=DAYZBASE``` to the server.properties file and regeneration a new world

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Got an Issue or Suggestion?
Ideas and suggestions are always welcome on our [GitHub Issue Tracker](https://github.com/DayZ-Minecraft/DayZ/issues). A quicker way to get in contact would be to drop into our irc channel **#dayzminecraft** on **irc.esper.net**. 

### Want to help?
We can always use help. Whether you can make textures, create structures or code some new items we can use your help! Just drop in to the irc mentioned above or message HoBoS_TaCo on MinecraftForum for more information.
